description:
SATA to IDE Adapter (Convert SATA DVD Burner to IDE Interface Motherboard)Connect a SATA hard drive to you IDE motherboard with this SATA to IDE Adapter! Turn your SATA DVD ROM/Burner into IDE interface DVD drive. It features the JMicro JM20330 chipset and supports 3.5-inch SATA hard drives or SATA DVD Burner. It's compliant with SATA specification and supports up to 2TB hard drives! 

When IDE DVD Burner is discontinued, but plenty of SATA DVD Drive available in low price! You can try to use this! 

Works under DOS, Windows 7, XP, Vista, Server 2003 and more...NO SOFTWARE DRIVER REQUIRE, BIOS Detected!

Features: 
JMicro JM20330 chipset 
Converts Serial ATA to IDE (Parallel ATA) 
Compliant with Serial ATA specifications 
Supports most 3.5-inch SATA DVD BurnerPackage Included:
SATA to IDE Adapter
1 Year Warranty
title: SATA to IDE/PATA Converter Adapter (Covert SATA DVD Burner to IDE Interface Motherboard)
